attributes.title: He was watching me
attributes.review: I was sooo excited to download this app to support 🧚✨𝑏𝑢𝑛𝑘𝑒𝑟 𝑏𝑜𝑦✨🧚and was extremely disappointed with this app. When I use the app, I hear strange noises coming from my phone. Almost like an old orange man was watching me and moaning. Definitely would not recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.title: Ban This😔
attributes.review: This app has got to be one of the most horrific apps on here. I downloaded it only to open it and see a Cheeto✋🏼 This has got to be a no for me. It wasn’t useful at all and to top it all off it took hours to download. I am very dissatisfied with this app. Please take this down, useless. 🍊

well you see i open the app and it just crashed my whole phone. the screen went black and everything. when my phone turned back on all i saw was a 10 hour replay of Martha😁was🥰an🙃average🐕dog. She went💨aërf🍒&🤕ærph😪&👻EEEER🧟‍♀️Foreigner💕. 10/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: awful!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app for updates about our wonderful President and what he was up to, but all I got was spam!!!! I was sent six freakin texts in one day about different products! This app has absolutely nothing to do with Mr. Trump and his activities and I am very disappointed 😡

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I thought this was subway surfers then my phone started to form into a Cheeto then all of a sudden it was grabbing me by my weave and dragging me through my carpet. As I’m  watching my fingertips let go from my hold of the ground, then I thought “I want a bacon egg and cheese” as my head was getting stomped on. It shattered my cheek bone.

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: I was trying to use the app and show my parents when Trumps next campaign is and see any new news but every time I opened it it took me out again. I tried everything but it simply wouldn’t work. This is terrible.

attributes.title: TALE THIS DOWN
attributes.review: So I was coming thinking u was gonna write a good review but when I downloaded this app i notice all my thing in my room were turning orange like trumps face I was so scared I couldn’t even sleep I had horrible dreams about orange all over my house oh my god just this app is horrible don’t get it plz

attributes.title: Unsafe....
attributes.review:
I feel very very uneasy about giving out so much of my personal info to an app!! No password no nothing to protect my information!!! I can not believe the president didn’t think of keeping us safe from the liberals!! I am disappointed.

(We really do be close, 1.2 stars)

attributes.title: App Makes Phone Crash
attributes.review: I’ve Been Using This App For Months Now But All Of A Sudden It Started Crashing And ADs Were Popping Up Non-Stop Even When I Wasn’t On The App . This App Is Deplorable,, It Broke My Phone And I Can’t Get It Fixed Because Of This CoronaVirus Because You Didn’t Handle It Properly  . Do Better !

attributes.title: Really confusing
attributes.review: This app is really hard to navigate and impossible to enjoy. For some reason there is a picture of an engorged Oompa Loompa all over the place. I am not sure if this is a bug or not but either way I would not recommend this app.
